entries.npc_noloc_12: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_11: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_10: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_9: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_8: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_6: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_7: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_5: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_4: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_3: Let me find out where it is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Let me find out where he is. Come back in a few minutes and I should have more info.
entries.player_reset: I don't think I can do this.
entries.npc_backtowork: Get to it.  I need this done as soon as you can do it.
entries.npc_reset: Ok, Let me know if you can work for me later.
entries.return: To finish this mission, return to the noble who gave you the task.
entries.npc_smuggle_12: I sure hope we get what we want out of this bowl.
entries.npc_smuggle_11: I have to get off this planet.  See ya.
entries.npc_smuggle_10: Well, I got to get to the reading.  Take care!
entries.npc_smuggle_9: Thanks a lot, friend.  This camera is very sentimental to me.
entries.npc_breech_12: I take it you have the bowl?
entries.npc_breech_11: Good thing you came instead of my friend.  There would have been bloodshed.
entries.npc_breech_8: As soon as I get back to town I'm disowning my family.
entries.npc_breech_6: Do you know where the reception is?
entries.npc_breech_5: Are you here to help me?
entries.npc_breech_3: You want to buy some hyperdrive parts...hey!  I'll take care of you!
entries.npc_breech_2: You're not getting these signatures!  I won't let that fool get elected!
entries.npc_breech_1: Oh, you want this glass?  You can't have it!
entries.npc_takeme_8: Thank you.  I thought I was going to be stuck out here all day.  Let's get going.
entries.npc_takeme_7: Somebody told you I was drunk?  Liars.  I don't drink.  Now let's get back before I get thirsty.
entries.npc_takeme_6: Great!  Let's go, I don't want to miss that reception!
entries.npc_takeme_5: I hope you're here to get me back to my friend.
entries.escortother: I think you're looking for someone else.
entries.otherescort: I think you're here to pick up someone else.  You're certainly not taking ME anywhere.
entries.dontknowyou: I'm sorry but I don't recognize you and I'm not going to follow you anywhere.
entries.player_3_8: You guys just play hide and seek out in the desert?
entries.player_3_5: What does this friend of yours do?
entries.npc_4_8: Well, when you're rich you can pretty much do what you want.
entries.npc_4_7: Only when we're celebrating.  Which is pretty much every day I gues...
entries.npc_4_6: It's my uncle's fiftieth birthday, or my aunt's fortieth birthday, or my grandparent's wedding anniversary...or...no, I can't remember.
entries.npc_4_5: Well, this and that.  There's not much to tell really.  You know.
entries.npc_reward_8: Here's a recording rod that I paid way too much for.  It's valuable but fragile.  Be careful with it.
entries.npc_3_8: Just like my servants.  No help at all.  Good day.
entries.npc_2_8: Very nice of you, I must say.  I thought you looked a little, um...dangerous, but I can see you're as trustworthy as the day is long.
entries.npc_1_8: Sibling rivalry has led to a very severe game of hide and seek, unfortunately one of the players is still hiding and doesn't realize the game is over.  I need someone to find them and bring them back here to me.
entries.player_1_8: Sounds crazy but I'll do it.
entries.npc_reward_7: Here you go.  This is a picture I took taking off from an undiscovered planet.  That picture is one of a kind.
entries.player_2_7: I thought rich people had servants to do their work.
entries.npc_3_7: I should have taken the advice of the jawas.  They told me not to trust people like you.
entries.npc_2_7: Good.  When you get back we'll work out some payment arrangements.
entries.npc_1_7: My friend got lost trying to find his way home.  I think there may have been some Corellian wine involved, you know?  Can you help my friend make it back to me here?
entries.npc_reward_6: Here's your official proclamation.  It won't be valid unless I get elected, but hang onto it just in case.
entries.player_2_6: No way.   I couldn't care less about this.
entries.npc_3_6: You have no idea how much damage I could do to your life.  But begone, and if you're lucky I'll forget you.
entries.npc_2_6: Hurry please, I don't want the party to start without us!
entries.npc_1_6: One of my relatives is trying to get to me so that we can go to a reception together, but has managed to get lost outside of town.  Can you help out?
entries.npc_reward_5: Careful with this thing.  It's well put together, but if you crush it it won't be worth as much.
entries.player_1_5: Yeah, I can do it.  I'll need some form of payment though.
entries.npc_3_5: Oh.  Well, fine then.  Be that way.
entries.npc_2_5: Good.  I'll let you in on a little secret...this person's not exactly a friend, but don't worry, you'll get paid for your work.
entries.npc_1_5: A good friend of mine has gotten lost outside of town and needs to find a way to get back to me.  Can you help?
entries.player_3_12: Why don't you just buy your own dishes?
entries.player_3_11: How did you end up with your friends hyperdrive parts?
entries.player_3_10: Why is the briefcase so important?
entries.player_3_9: What's the deal with the camera?  Is it expensive?
entries.npc_4_12: It's just a family thing.  Nobody wants the stupid bowl.  I'll tell you a secret...it smells.
entries.npc_4_11: Well, see, the practical jokes sort of escalated, and now my friend has to leave so...
entries.npc_4_10: All the important documentation's in the briefcase.  There's not going to be much of a will reading without it.
entries.npc_4_9: It's a family heirloom, this camera.  It doesn't even work, but we keep it just the same.
entries.npc_reward_12: Here's a recording rod that I paid way too much for.  It's valuable but fragile.  Be careful with it.
entries.npc_3_12: Fine.  I guess I'll have to do it myself.  Or maybe someone else will come along...
entries.npc_2_12: Perfect.  I have to get things ready here for the stuff that we're buying to bring back.
entries.npc_1_12: My cousin's on the way to an auction, but forgot the bowl we were going to sell.  Can you take it out there and hand it off?  Please?
entries.player_2_12: This sounds like a lot of work for a smelly old bowl.
entries.npc_reward_11: Thanks so much.  I'm giving you a picture my friend painted of me.  Isn't that special?
entries.npc_3_11: Oh, I'm not looking forward to delivering this.  My friend's gonna be mad....
entries.npc_2_11: Great!  I think if I went I'd come back bruised, if you know what I mean.
entries.npc_1_11: A friend of mine and I were playing practical jokes on each other, and...well, suffice to say I have a hyperdrive part here...and uh...my friend sort of needs it...can you take it?
entries.npc_reward_10: Well, all I had was some fireworks...we were, uh...sort of celebrating...but it has nothing to do with the will, I promise!
entries.player_2_10: No way.  Not unless I'm in the will.
entries.npc_3_10: Well, fine.  I didn't want to have to do all that walking myself.  These are new shoes...
entries.npc_2_10: Oh good.  I didn't want to have to do it myself.  I'll see if I can find something nice for you.
entries.npc_1_10: One of my neighbors has gone off to the reading of a will, but forgot to take their briefcase.  Can you take it out there before they arrive?
entries.npc_reward_9: I don't know that this will actually explode, but boy if it does...
entries.player_2_9: Sounds dull.  I'll wait for something more exciting to come along.
entries.npc_3_9: Oh, well, if you don't need the work...
entries.npc_2_9: Excellent.  I have some old fireworks that we were saving for my Lifeday, but I'll let you have them instead.
entries.npc_1_9: My cousin left this camera at my house during a recent visit.  He's on his way home, but if you could take this to him before he gets there I'll make sure you get something nice in return.
entries.player_3_4: Why don't you just buy your own dishes?
entries.player_3_3: Why would they steal parts of your ship?
entries.player_3_2: What office are you running for?
entries.player_3_1: Somebody stole an heirloom glass?  Why?
entries.npc_4_4: A nobleman gets other people to do these things for him.  People like you.
entries.npc_4_3: Ship parts are expensive.  They're probably trying to build their own ship, or they're going to sell it on the black market.
entries.npc_4_2: Actually I don't remember.  That's another reason I need that ledger back.  It might have been mayor...or chief of police...hm...
entries.npc_4_1: Well, it's not much to look at, but I guess because it was in the safe they assumed it was valuable.  It is, but only to me really, they won't get much for it.
entries.npc_reward_4: Here's a recording rod that I paid way too much for.  It's valuable but fragile.  Be careful with it.
entries.npc_3_4: Just like my servants.  No help at all.
entries.npc_2_4: I thought you looked like the one I wanted.  I'll reward you nicely for it.
entries.npc_1_4: My servants won't get me the dishes I want.  There's  a guy who has a bowl that's the exact one I want.  I don't care how you do it, just get me that bowl.
entries.player_1_4: Sounds crazy but I'll do it.
entries.npc_reward_3: Here you go.  This is a picture I took taking off from an undiscovered planet.  That picture is one of a kind.
entries.player_2_3: I thought pilots did their own work.  I'll be going.
entries.npc_3_3: I thought you were a tough one.  I guess not.
entries.npc_2_3: Ok.  Just let me know when you've got it.
entries.npc_1_3: A gang of ruffians stole part of the hyperdrive out of my ship.  Get it back for me and I'll give you something nice.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here's your official proclamation.  It won't be valid unless I get elected, but hang onto it just in case.
entries.player_2_2: No way.   I couldn't care less about politics.
entries.player_1_2: Sure, I'll get your ledger back.  I need friends in high places.
entries.npc_3_2: That's too bad.  I could have done you a lot of favors.
entries.npc_2_2: Excellent.  Just let me know when you return, I'll have the paperwork drawn up.
entries.npc_1_2: I was collecting signatures to get my name on the local ballot when one of my opponents sent a theif to steal my ledger.  If you can get that ledger back for me I'll write a proclamation declaring you a good citizen.
entries.npc_reward_1: Careful with this thing.  It's well put together, but if you crush it it won't be worth as much.
entries.player_2_1: Sounds ridiculous.  Why don't you just go buy a new glass?
entries.player_1_1: Yeah, I can get it.  I'll need some form of payment though.
entries.npc_3_1: I thought you were a mercenary?  Perhaps you're just a librarian or some such...
entries.npc_2_1: You're a life saver.  I'll give you this hand woven basket for the glass when you return.  My servants made it.
entries.npc_1_1: My family has had this heirloom glass for many years, and now it's been stolen.  I can tell you where the thief is, but I need you to bring back my glass unharmed.  Can you do it?
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
